name: Kudla - Kaurna Solitaire
description: Based on the popular card game Solitaire, ‘Kudla’ (meaning ‘alone’ or ‘by yourself’) uses the cards designed by Kaurna Warra Pintyanthi with Kaurna numbers and cultural adaptations.  It’s a fun way to learn numbers in Kaurna - the reawakened Australian Indigenous Language of the Adelaide Plains.  For more information and to purchase your own pack of Kaurna playing cards and other useful resources, visit www.kaurnawarra.org.au
